text: Loren LaPorte is an American softball coach who is the current head coach at James Madison. ==Coaching career== ===James Madison (asst.)=== On July 31, 2012, LaPorte was announced as an assistant coach of the James Madison softball program. ===James Madison (Head coach)=== On September 14, 2017, Loren LaPorte was promoted to head coach of the James Madison softball program after the departure of Mickey Dean who left for Auburn. ==Head coaching record== ===College=== ==References== Category:Living people Category:Female sports coaches Category:American softball coaches Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Radford Highlanders softball coaches Category:James Madison Dukes softball coaches Category:Roanoke College alumni Category:People from Northumberland County, Virginia
title: Loren LaPorte
